page.title: 19Shepley Library.
page.content: The library in Shepley is situated in the old council rooms in Marsh Lane.It is staffed by two people and has a wide selection of books,although the space available is fairly limited. The library or council rooms are also available for use by local clubs ,societies and the school.Such things as coffee mornings,childrens days and parties are held. The actual library is only open on Mondays,Wednesdays,Thursdays and Fridays and has a noticeboard which keeps people informed of the various events going on in the village.
